abstract: JPMorgan Chase has picked up its first advisory mandate from the Nasdaq Stock Market since standing down as financial adviser on the exchange’s hostile bid for the London Stock Exchange to avoid a conflict of interest.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has picked up its first advisory mandate from the Nasdaq Stock Market since standing down as financial adviser on the exchange’s hostile bid for the London Stock Exchange to avoid a conflict of interest.

headline.main: JPMorgan Back on Board in Nasdaq’s Latest Exchange Deal
